verses.verse: My heart <S%H3820><s%> is gushing <S%H7370><s%> a good <S%H2896><s%> matter <S%H1697><s%>: I speak <S%H559><s%> of the things which I have made <S%H4639><s%> touching the king <S%H4428><s%>: my tongue <S%H3956><s%> is the pen <S%H5842><s%> of a ready <S%H4106><s%> writer <S%H5608><s%>.

You are fairer <S%H3302><s%> than the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>: grace <S%H2580><s%> is poured <S%H3332><s%> into your lips <S%H8193><s%>: therefore God <S%H430><s%> has blessed <S%H1288><s%> you for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
Clothe <S%H2296><s%> your sword <S%H2719><s%> upon your thigh <S%H3409><s%>, O most mighty <S%H1368><s%>, with your glory <S%H1935><s%> and your majesty <S%H1926><s%>.

And in your majesty <S%H1926><s%> ride <S%H7392><s%> prosperously <S%H6743><s%> because <S%H1697><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%> and meekness <S%H6037><s%> and righteousness <S%H6664><s%>; and your right hand <S%H3225><s%> shall teach <S%H3384><s%> you terrible things <S%H3372><s%>.
Your arrows <S%H2671><s%> are sharp <S%H8150><s%> in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>'s enemies <S%H341><s%>; by which the people <S%H5971><s%> fall under you <S%H5307><s%>.

Your throne <S%H3678><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, is for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>: the scepter <S%H7626><s%> of your kingdom <S%H4438><s%> is a right <S%H4334><s%> scepter <S%H7626><s%>.

You love <S%H157><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and hate <S%H8130><s%> wickedness <S%H7562><s%>: therefore God <S%H430><s%>, your God <S%H430><s%>, has anointed <S%H4886><s%> you with the oil <S%H8081><s%> of gladness <S%H8342><s%> above your fellows <S%H2270><s%>.

All your garments <S%H899><s%> smell of myrrh <S%H4753><s%>, and aloes <S%H174><s%>, and cassia <S%H7102><s%>, out of the ivory <S%H8127><s%> palaces <S%H1964><s%>, by which <S%H4482><s%> they have made you glad <S%H8055><s%>.

Kings <S%H4428><s%>' daughters <S%H1323><s%> were among your honorable women <S%H3368><s%>: upon your right hand <S%H3225><s%> did stand <S%H5324><s%> the queen <S%H7694><s%> in gold <S%H3800><s%> of Ophir <S%H211><s%>.

Listen <S%H8085><s%>, O daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and consider <S%H7200><s%>, and incline <S%H5186><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%>; forget <S%H7911><s%> also your own people <S%H5971><s%>, and your father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>;
So shall the king <S%H4428><s%> greatly desire <S%H183><s%> your beauty <S%H3308><s%>: for he is your Lord <S%H113><s%>; and worship you him <S%H7812><s%>.

And the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Tyre <S%H6865><s%> shall be there with a gift <S%H4503><s%>; even the rich <S%H6223><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%> shall entreat <S%H2470><s%> your favor <S%H6440><s%>.
The king <S%H4428><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%> is all glorious <S%H3520><s%> inside <S%H6441><s%>: her clothing <S%H3830><s%> is of worked <S%H4865><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>.

She shall be brought <S%H2986><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%> in clothes of needlework <S%H7553><s%>: the virgins <S%H1330><s%> her companions <S%H7464><s%> that follow <S%H310><s%> her shall be brought unto you <S%H935><s%>.
With gladness <S%H8057><s%> and rejoicing <S%H1524><s%> shall they be brought <S%H2986><s%>: they shall enter <S%H935><s%> into the king <S%H4428><s%>'s palace <S%H1964><s%>.
Instead of your fathers <S%H1><s%> shall be your sons <S%H1121><s%>, whom you may make <S%H7896><s%> princes <S%H8269><s%> in all the earth <S%H776><s%>.

I will make your name <S%H8034><s%> to be remembered <S%H2142><s%> in all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>: therefore shall the people <S%H5971><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> you for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>.
